name: mw-bp-node-typescript
description: Boilerplate project for a Node.js backend with Typescript support.

scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/nodemon --exec 'npm run lint && node_modules/.bin/ts-node src/index.ts'
scripts.debug: NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/nodemon --exec 'npm run lint && node_modules/.bin/ts-node -d src/index.ts'

author: Brian Sokol <brian.sokol@slalom.com>
